TopicTitle: My special recoginition thread to say thanks.

Articles.Content:
Rather than write a thank you message in each mod thread ( I cant be bothred as you guys have done such a good job Im to busy playing!) I thought I post my thanks to the developers of these mods.

FAR

KSP Intersteller

Nova Punch

Procedial fairings

MecJeb

KAS

VOID

Crew manifest

To me those mod may as well be core for me and I couldnt play KSP without.

Edited January 26, 2014 by crazyewok
